name: GuessTheAnimalNoise
0:
”Alexa, open Guess the Animal Noise and start a new game”
”repeat the clues”
”play a new game”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess the animal noise
des: Guess the Animal Noise is a fun and educational game that your family will have fun playing. Each question provides an audio clip of the animal making their typical sound. You listen for the noise and guess the animal that makes that noise. Animal noises are played, guess the most correct to win. More animals will be added over time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
